name: JEDD
description:
Basically, a game with fnaf-like gameplay, but not associated with fnaf in any other way. Inspired a little bit by SCP.
It uses pixelarted graphics, but we were relying more on making a bugless, fun and hard gameplay rather than on making it shine from the graphic side.
Click on the folder on the desk to gather info about creatures that roam the halls.
If you're having trouble understanding the mechanics, die three times and a button leading to the screen that explains everything in detail will appear.
Instructions:
- Survive until 6 am each night to win!
- That shouldn't be hard, right?

alternative page:

https://gamejolt.com/games/JEDD/372762

GL HF!
